data.text:
Give Crayons

Ship Your Crayons

Drop Off Your Unwanted Crayons at Any Staples Store

As part of the Staples Writing Tools Recycling Program, you can drop off your used or unwanted crayons at any Staples Store location across the United States. Staples will ship them to us at no cost to you!

Find a Staples

Near You

Ship Crayons Directly to Us

You can always ship your unwanted crayons directly to us! Download the shipping instructions to be sure you get our nonprofit shipping rate.

Download Your Shipping Instructions

“My school collects crayons for your initiative. Last year my son was hospitalized and they also gave us a pack of your crayons! Loved seeing it come full-circle!”

— Brandy Shelton, Elementary School Teacher

Learn everything you need to run a successful collection drive at your school. Full of great fundraising ideas and Common Core activities for kids of all grade levels.

A service idea that's well worth exploring for all Girl Scouts, Boy Scouts, Cub Scouts, Brownies, YMCA youth groups and more. We even have merit badges.

A winning game plan for your local sports team, religious group, chamber of commerce, community club, or charitable organization. Anyone looking to have a good time, while doing a lot of good.

Turn your leftover crayons into smiles for kids in hospitals—using our tasteful collecting boxes. Thousands of restaurants across the country are following this simple recipe.
